Reviews.Title: Not Passive or Active but work just fine!  Very pleased
Reviews.Author: PaulsLaw
Reviews.Content: I bought these for running a Zmodo CCTV system down Cat5.  My furthest pole is 400' from the DVR & I run 4 cams down one cat line.  Picture is just fine honestly, they've been on there for months now.  Do note I use Ubiquiti "Tough Cable"  TC-L2, but then who uses cheap cat wire at 400' right.For the cost of passive & active baluns, I would honestly give these a shot, you'd be impressed.  As this whole pack costs just one of the other guys...

ProductInfo.Features:
5 Cameras, CAT5 TO BNC Passive Video and Power Balun Transceiver
Great for short distance connection -Easier for CCTV camera installation, save time and save money
2.1 x 5.5mm CCTV Camera DC Power Plug Connector.
Cat5 to BNC Connector
Model: DSC-Cat5-Pack
ProductInfo.Name: CAT5 TO BNC Passive Video and Power Balun Transceiver (5 Pairs)
